special_abilities.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest).
descriptions: On his turn, Langdedrosa can take one additional action.

special_abilities.name: Improved Critical.
descriptions: Langdedrosa's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Langdedrosa attacks twice, either with his greatsword or spear.

actions.name: Greatsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft.,/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6).
descriptions: Langdedrosa breathes lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
